root: ^Looking around darkness engulfing you, a sense of being watched creeps up your spine.
^Glancing down is a faded, broken yellow brick road.
^In the distance, you can barely make out a single street lamp.

Yellow_Brick_Road: ^Begin walking towards the only light on the road
Street_Lamp: ^As you near the street lamp, a rustle emerges from the forest.
^You can feel your heart in your throat,
